definitions.title: vb. 1.
definitions.body: be good, kind (NH [[חָסַד]] in deriv. [[חָסִיד]] pious; Aram [[חֲסַד]] be kind, mild (then beg), chiefly in deriv. [[חִסְדָּא]] etc.; cf. perh. Ar. h.a4ada usu. pl. they assembled, sq. lahu they combined for him, and took pains to shew him courtesy Lane: 574 c, also RS: Proph. iv. n. 9 (and Schu AE v. in Thes); >Thes al. Find primary meaning in eager zeal or desire (‖ [[קנא]]), whence develop kindness (as above), and envy, Ar. h.asada, h.asadun envy (vb. & n.), Aram. [[חֲסַד]] be put to shame,  h.ased, [[חַסֵּד]] reproach, revile, v, II. [[חסד]])—only

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[עִס־חָסִיד תִּחְַסָָּד]] thou shewest thyself kind 2Sa 22:26 = Ps 18:26.—On
